post:
Hello LET :smile: 

Nexril is currently offering a limited quantity of Ryzen VPS in Dallas, TX again, starting at only $15/year!

<hr>

Plans Available:

Promo Code: <code>LET-RYZEN-VPS</code> (Limited to 20 uses)

Ryzen 1GB | 1 vCore | 15GB NVMe RAID-10 SSD | [$15/year](https://nexril.net/order/82 "$15/year")
Ryzen 2GB | 1 vCore | 30GB NVMe RAID-10 SSD | [$30/year](https://nexril.net/order/83 "$30/year")
Ryzen 4GB | 2 vCores | 60GB NVMe RAID-10 SSD | [$60/year](https://nexril.net/order/84 "$60/year")

<hr>


Features:
* 1 Gbps Network Port
* DDoS Protection Included
* 1 IPv4 + /64 IPv6 Subnet
* Pure RAID10 NVMe SSD Storage
* 99.99% Uptime SLA
* Instant Provisioning after Payment
* SolusVM Control Panel
* Automated IPv4/v6 rDNS Management
* Additional IP's for $1/month each

<hr>

Test IP: https://lg.nexril.net/

YABS:
